web_snippets: Uday Khandeparkar. Rat-Race Retired. Self-employed Bombay College of Journalism. Mumbai Metropolitan Region.
Journalist turned writer Uday Khandeparkar calls himself a munchkin given his somewhat diminutive size, but his professional career has been anything but.
